activities: As a global company, Cypress collects, accesses, processes and stores information on our EU employees, customers and partners in order to manage the employment and business relationships.  We only process the information absolutely necessary to support our global employees and customers and only with their explicit consent.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: None - we are managing our privacy compliance without third party intervention.
